rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg001
rows.name:
This looks like a good spot
to have a proper chat.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg006
rows.name: So, what did you want to talk about?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg007
rows.name:
Well, listen, Meleph...
What do you think of me?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg002
rows.name:
Forgive me, Saika, but I'm not
sure I understand the question.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg003
rows.name:
Well, um, I was wondering...
Do you think I'm feminine enough?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg008
rows.name: How should I respond?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg004
rows.name: I think you're a cute young woman.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg005
rows.name: Wait, are you confessing to me?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg101
rows.name:
Don't worry. I think you're
a cute young woman.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg102
rows.name:
I mean, next to you Meleph,
most women would look pretty
feminine and cute...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg103
rows.name: Are you making fun of me?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg104
rows.name:
No, that's not what I meant!
Sorry, I'm not good with words.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg105
rows.name: ...Hmm.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg106
rows.name:
Don't you think Homura and Kagutsuchi
show off way more sex appeal
compared to me?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg107
rows.name:
Indeed, not only Kagutsuchi
but also Homura gives off
a healthy feminine vibe.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg108
rows.name: Right?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg120
rows.name:
I think I need more sex appeal
to become a more
attractive Blade.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg109
rows.name: I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg121
rows.name:
So that's why you're asking me,
who has sex appeal,
for advice.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg110
rows.name: No, no! I wouldn't come to you for that sort of advice!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg111
rows.name: Meleph, you're basically like a man, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg112
rows.name: Hmph.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg113
rows.name:
That's why I figured
you'd know how men think.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg114
rows.name:
...Hahahah.
I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg115
rows.name: Great! So you get what I'm saying!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg116
rows.name:
So, from your perspective,
what do you think is different
between me and those two?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg117
rows.name:
I don't care!
Figure it out yourself!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg118
rows.name: What?! Wait a minute!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg119
rows.name:
You're going to help me, right?
Don't act all high and mighty,
just tell me!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg220
rows.name: Could we put that confession on hold for now?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg201
rows.name:
Saika,
you probably haven't noticed,
but I am actually a woman.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg202
rows.name: Therefore, I cannot accept your feelings...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg203
rows.name:
Hehehe,
that's a funny joke
coming from you, Meleph.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg221
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg204
rows.name: Almost everyone knows you're a woman.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg222
rows.name:
That's not it.
I just wanted to ask about femininity.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg205
rows.name:
Hmm...
You're asking me about femininity?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg206
rows.name:
You may dress like a man, Meleph,
but you still care about
looking feminine, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg223
rows.name:
Your hair, skin,
and delicate fingertips
are all beautiful.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg207
rows.name:
You're quite observant
about the details

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg208
rows.name:
Well, of course.
It's only natural
for a girl Blade like me.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg224
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg225
rows.name:
So there's a man you want
to get the attention of.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg209
rows.name: No, no, no, that's not it!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg226
rows.name:
I just wanted to learn what beauty
routines adult women like
you and Kagutsuchi follow.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg210
rows.name: Really?

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg211
rows.name: I swear it's true!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg212
rows.name: Hmm...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg227
rows.name:
Both Kagutsuchi and I order
Elastifying Tonic and Refreshing Gel
from Avaritia.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg213
rows.name: I see, I see...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg228
rows.name: Divine Beast Oil Hand Cream is also excellent.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg214
rows.name: Got it, got it...

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg215
rows.name:
I'll tell Zeke to buy some
for you next time.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg216
rows.name: Please don't do that!

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg218
rows.name: This kind of thing is best done in secret.

rows.label: kizunatalk015_msg219
rows.name: Don't you dare tell anyone!
